cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 70 mi (115 km) SSE of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest through the Straits of Florida, expected to cross the Lower Florida Keys and then move along the west coast of Florida before turning inland over the Florida Panhandle and southwest Georgia

weather_observation.watch_coast: North of Fernandina Beach FL to Edisto Beach SC under Hurricane Watch; Tropical-storm watches/warnings extend northward to South Santee River SC and westward along the Florida Panhandle coast.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings for Fernandina Beach FL southward around the Florida peninsula to Indian Pass, including the Florida Keys, Lake Okeechobee and Florida Bay; Storm-surge warnings from South Santee River SC southward around the peninsula to the Ochlockonee River FL including Tampa Bay.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Cuban north coast, northwestern Bahamas, entire Florida peninsula and Keys, Gulf Coast of Florida, Georgia and South Carolina coasts.
